prod_short_desc: Discover new horizons with the Ocean Explorer!
prod_long_desc:
Enjoy seafaring adventures with this LEGO® Technic Ocean Explorer set, featuring a ship with a dark-blue, red and white color scheme, plus a buildable submarine with movable arms and spinning propeller, and a buildable helicopter with spinning rotors. The ship features a large captain’s bridge with radar and funnel detailing, plus a landing pad, working crane and an opening deck hatch for access to the ship’s hull, complete with bulbous bow and two fenders. This detailed 2-in-1 set has been designed to provide an immersive and rewarding building experience and can be rebuilt to create a Push Boat and Barge.
Build an authentically detailed LEGO Technic model of an ocean exploration ship with a captain’s bridge, landing pad, working crane, and opening deck hatch for hull access, plus a buildable helicopter and submarine!
Includes uniquely decorated LEGO Technic 40th anniversary brick
2-in-1 model: Rebuild it into a Push Boat and Barge
LEGO Technic building toys are compatible with other LEGO construction sets for creative building
Ship with crane boom extended to the side is over 7” high, 22” long, and 9” wide, and over 7” high and 4” wide with crane boom retracted. Submarine is over 2” high, 5” long, and 2” wide. Helicopter is over 2” high, 5” long, and 4” wide. Push Boat is over 6” high, 9” long, and 5” wide. Barge is over 3” high, 15” long, and 5” wide.
1327 pieces – For boys and girls between the ages of 10 and 16 years old
